mapper.select: SELECT tproj.proj_id, tproj.proj_name, tc.client_name, tproj.start_date, tproj.end_date, devtype.dev_type_name, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tbl_user_project AS tup WHERE tup.proj_id = tproj.proj_id) AS members, ps.proj_status_name FROM tbl_project_mst AS tproj INNER JOIN tbl_proj_info AS tpi ON tproj.proj_id = tpi.proj_id LEFT JOIN tbl_clients_mst AS tc ON tpi.client_id = tc.client_id LEFT JOIN tbl_dev_type_mst AS devtype ON tpi.dev_type_id = devtype.dev_type_id LEFT JOIN tbl_proj_status_mst AS ps ON tpi.proj_status_id = ps.proj_status_id WHERE tproj.del_flag = 0 ORDER BY tproj.proj_id DESC, tproj.reg_date DESC;
SELECT proj_id, proj_name, proj_code, proj_description, start_date, end_date, del_flag FROM tbl_project_mst WHERE del_flag = 0 ORDER BY proj_id DESC, reg_date DESC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_project_mst( proj_name, proj_code, proj_description, start_date, end_date, reg_id ) VALUES ( #{proj_name}, #{proj_code}, #{proj_description}, #{start_date}, #{end_date}, 1 );
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_project_mst SET proj_name=#{project.proj_name}, proj_code=#{project.proj_code}, proj_description=#{project.proj_description}, start_date=#{project.start_date}, end_date=#{project.end_date}, update_id = 1 WHERE proj_id = #{id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tbl_multi_role WHERE emp_id = #{emp_id} AND role_id = #{role_id}
mapper.select: SELECT tmanager.emp_id, tpi.fname, tpi.lname FROM tbl_project_mst AS tproj INNER JOIN tbl_proj_manager AS tmanager ON tproj.proj_id = tmanager.proj_id LEFT JOIN tbl_personal_info AS tpi ON tpi.emp_id = tmanager.emp_id WHERE tmanager.proj_id = #{proj_id};

SELECT tpp.dev_phase_id, tphase.dev_phase_name FROM tbl_project_mst AS tproj INNER JOIN tbl_proj_phase AS tpp ON tproj.proj_id = tpp.proj_id LEFT JOIN tbl_dev_phase_mst AS tphase ON tphase.dev_phase_id = tpp.dev_phase_id WHERE tpp.proj_id = #{proj_id};

SELECT tup.emp_id, tpi.fname, tpi.lname, tposition.position_sh_name FROM tbl_project_mst AS tproj INNER JOIN tbl_user_project AS tup ON tproj.proj_id = tup.proj_id LEFT JOIN tbl_personal_info AS tpi ON tpi.emp_id = tup.emp_id LEFT JOIN tbl_user AS tuser ON tuser.emp_id = tup.emp_id LEFT JOIN tbl_position_mst AS tposition ON tposition.position_id = tuser.position_id WHERE tup.proj_id = #{proj_id};
